body: The settlement has a reputation (deserved or not) for being a den of iniquity. Thieves, rogues, and cutthroats are much more common here. (Crime +1; Law –1; Danger +10; increase base value by 30%; increase purchase limit by 50%)
name: Notorious
url: pfsrd://Game Mastery Guide/Rules/Settlements/Settlements in Play/Settlement Qualities/Notorious
